short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the original Winamp Theme style as a skin to the Spotify Web player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the original Winamp Theme style as a skin to the Spotify Web player.  Clicking the extension icon will popup a text button, and when the user clicks this button, the theme will render.
